casename: Lemon Grass Pte Ltd v Peranakan Place Complex Pte Ltd
counsel: Tan Teng Muan and Kwok Mei Yui Deanna (Mallal & Namazie) for the plaintiffs; Lawrence Quahe and Chenthil Kumarasingam (Harry Elias Partnership) for the defendants
